mapper.sql: device_id, device_manage_control_id, device_name, device_code, device_ip, device_status, status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, device_type, device_source,rom_version,ram_size,idc_id,enable_status, device_use
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from rf_device
and ip2int(device_ip) >= ip2int(#{map.deviceStartIp})
and ip2int(device_ip) <= ip2int(#{map.deviceEndIp})
order by ${orderByClause}

select nextval('seq_rf_device')

((select nextval('seq_rf_device')), #{one.deviceManageControlId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{one.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.deviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.deviceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{one.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{one.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{one.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one.deviceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{one.romVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{one.ramSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{one.idcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{one.enableStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{one.deviceUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update rf_device
device_manage_control_id = (case when device_manage_control_id is null then #{record.deviceManageControlId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else device_manage_control_id + #{record.deviceManageControlId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
